author: Matthew Mueller
title: DC Unveils Toy Fair 2017 Collectibles
text:
DC Unveils Toy Fair 2017 Collectibles Matthew Mueller Start Slideshow Slide of 
DC made a big splash at this year's Toy Fair, unleashing a huge wave of movie and comic styled statues and action figures, and here's a heavy sampling of what they've got in store for 2017. 
DC previously showed off their Justice League movie statues , which continues to fuel the 4.35 out of 5 the film has on ComicBook.com's anticipation ranking . DC isn't abandoning you comic fans however, and they've got new additions to some of the most popular lines ( via Action Figure Insider ), including the Batman Black and White line. The fan-favorite series will be getting four new additions that include Batman statues styled after Amanda Conner, John Romita Jr., and Jonathan Matthews. There will also be a Conners inspired Harley Quinn to round out the set. 
If you're more a diorama fan, DC will be offering a Batman vs Harley Quinn statue (complete with Harley's hyenas), a Designer Series Superman , and a beautiful Designer Series Aquaman and Mera statue. For fans of the animated series, you'll also have 15.5 x 17 x 21 Batcave Vignette will include a light-up Bat-computer, interchangeable computer screens, and an exclusive Alfred figure. 
“The Batcave Vignette is a great example of how we’re constantly looking for new ways to capture the most iconic and authentic moments from the DC Universe and reimagine them in three-dimensional form,” stated DC Collectibles Executive Director, Creative, Jim Fletcher. “Now Batman: The Animated Series action figure collectors have an entirely new way to display and enhance their collections.” 
In addition, there will also be a Harley's Holiday statue if you prefer villains. 
DC Bombshell fans will also have more than a few choices, with a Harley Quinn Deluxe statue and a new Starfire Bombshell statue joining the line. There will also be a Designer Series action figure set themed after Ant Lucia's art with Mera, Katana, Batgirl, Hawkgirl, Supergirl, and Bumblebee. 
Action figure fans will also be able to purchase several DC Icons figures, including Supergirl (Rebirth), Nightwing (Hush), a Super Sons Two-Pack, and a Death of Superman Two-Pack that comes with Doomsday, three interchangeable heads for Superman, and heat vision accessory. 
Hit the next slide to get an up-close look at DC Collectibles 2017 offerings. Justice League 2017 ComicBook Anticipated #8 Best-Rated Before Release Anticipated Rating
